languages.text: "Что вы там возитесь, Хейнрикс!" {n}— взволнованный Абеляр выглядывает из-за плеча дознавателя.{/n} "Я не могу потерять второго Вольного Торговца за такой смешной промежуток времени! А, Ваша Светлость, вы снова в сознании... хвала Трону!"

"Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"
languages.original_text: "Что вы там возитесь, Хейнрикс!" {n}— взволнованный Абеляр выглядывает из-за плеча дознавателя.{/n} "Я не могу потерять второго Вольного Торговца за такой смешной промежуток времени! А, Ваша Светлость, вы снова в сознании... хвала Трону!"

traits.locale_text: "Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peeks over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

"Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peeks over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

"Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

"Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

"Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

languages.text: «¡No remolonee, Heinrix!». {n}Abelard, agitado, mira por encima del hombro de Heinrix.{/n} «¡No puedo perder a un{mf||a} segund{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente en tan poco tiempo! ¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ha vuelto en sí! ¡Loado sea el Trono!».
languages.original_text: "Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No remolonee, Heinrix!». {n}Abelard, agitado, mira por encima del hombro de Heinrix.{/n} «¡No puedo perder a un{mf||a} segund{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente en tan poco tiempo! ¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ha vuelto en sí! ¡Loado sea el Trono!».

languages.text: 「ぐずぐずするな、ハインリックス！」{n}アベラルドは慌てた様子でハインリックスの肩越しにのぞき見る。{/n}「こんな短期間で二人目の自由開拓者を失うわけにはいかない！ああ、陛下…正気に戻られたのですね！王座に感謝します！」
languages.original_text: "Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: 「ぐずぐずするな、ハインリックス！」{n}アベラルドは慌てた様子でハインリックスの肩越しにのぞき見る。{/n}「こんな短期間で二人目の自由開拓者を失うわけにはいかない！ああ、陛下…正気に戻られたのですね！王座に感謝します！」

languages.text: “别磨蹭了，海因里希！”{n}阿贝拉德越过海因里希的肩膀看着你，看起来焦虑不安。{/n}“我决不能在这么短的时间里再次失去另一位行商浪人！哦，大人！您终于醒了！感谢黄金王座！”
languages.original_text: "Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: “别磨蹭了，海因里希！”{n}阿贝拉德越过海因里希的肩膀看着你，看起来焦虑不安。{/n}“我决不能在这么短的时间里再次失去另一位行商浪人！哦，大人！您终于醒了！感谢黄金王座！”

languages.text: « Arrêtez de bayer aux corneilles, Heinrix ! » {n}Abélard vous jette un coup d'œil nerveux par-dessus l'épaule d'Heinrix.{/n} « Hors de question que je perde deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} en un laps de temps aussi court ! Oh, Votre Seigneurie, vous revoilà ! Le Trône soit loué ! »
languages.original_text: "Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez de bayer aux corneilles, Heinrix ! » {n}Abélard vous jette un coup d'œil nerveux par-dessus l'épaule d'Heinrix.{/n} « Hors de question que je perde deux {mf|libres-marchands|libres-marchandes} en un laps de temps aussi court ! Oh, Votre Seigneurie, vous revoilà ! Le Trône soit loué ! »

languages.text: "Hört auf zu zaudern, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard blickt über Heinrix' Schulter. Er wirkt aufgebracht.{/n} "Ich kann nicht in so lächerlich kurzer Zeit einen zweiten Freihändler verlieren! Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Ihr seid erwacht! Dem Thron sei Dank!"
languages.original_text: "Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf zu zaudern, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard blickt über Heinrix' Schulter. Er wirkt aufgebracht.{/n} "Ich kann nicht in so lächerlich kurzer Zeit einen zweiten Freihändler verlieren! Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Ihr seid erwacht! Dem Thron sei Dank!"

languages.text: "Heinrix, dikilip durmayı bırak!" {n}Abelard, Heinrix'in ardından öfkeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Bu kadar kısa bir sürede bir Hür Tacir daha kaybedemem! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kendinize gelmişsiniz! Taht'a şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Quit dawdling, Heinrix!" {n}Abelard peers over Heinrix's shoulder, looking agitated.{/n} "I can't lose a second Rogue Trader in such a ridiculous span of time! Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you've come to! Thank the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: “Heinrix, dikilip durmayı bırak!” {n}Abelard, Heinrix’in ardından öfkeli bir hâlde bakıyor.{/n} “İkinci Hür Tacir’imizi bu kadar kısa müddet içinde kaybedemeyiz! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, kendinize gelmişsiniz! Taht’a şükürler olsun!”
